title: [1.7.10][ssp/smp]AliensVsPredator, Prometheus--异形世界，普罗米修斯
author: Ben_Jian
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Ben_Jian 于 2015-11-14 19:07 编辑 

这是一个非常强大的MOD作者做这个我感到很厉害
可玩性非常高
它添加了一个次元
添加了一堆东西



这是他的一部分东西



原文
AliensVsPredator Mod for Minecraft. Based on the AVP, Alien, Predator and Prometheus movie series. The mod adds countless blocks, items, and mobs to the world of Minecraft for you to start Building Better Worlds(TM).    What is Aliens Vs Predator?  A simple Google of "Aliens Vs Predator" should give you a way better explanation of the subject than I can give you.   About the mod  The main purpose of this mod is to add challenge to the game. Minecraft lacks challenge. The lack of challenge makes the game become boring and players begin to drift away from it and start playing other games. As a person who likes challenges, I decided to fix that problem, and created a mod that gives the game a real challenge!   What does the mod add?  Mobs, Weapons, Armor, Dimensions, Blocks, Items, you name it! The mod is designed for both survival and creative players. Build your own testing facilities, survive the harsh conditions, do it all at the same time! 



关于MOD
必看，不然你玩不了
必须使用JAVA8或者JAVA7，JAV6及以下是玩不了的。还有，如果JAVA6还在你的后台，你需要解决它，不然你会得到不支持。请用JAVA打开那个jar，随后进行选择地址再下载请自行翻译以下文字

How to install the mods on a Minecraft Client 
Warning: Do not tamper with the mod files, you will break them. 

1.) Download and run the Minecraft Forge installer. 
2.) Choose 'Install Client', choose your game directory, and click "OK". 
3.) Run the game once or go to the game directory and create a 'mods' directory. 
4.) Download your Arisux mod of choice, and AIRI. AIRI is required. 
5.) Copy the mods you just downloaded into the 'mods' directory. 
6.) Open the Minecraft Launcher, select the forge profile, and run the game.

How to install the mods on a Minecraft Server 
Warning: Do not tamper with the mod files, you will break them. 

1.) Download and run the Minecraft Forge installer. 
2.) Choose 'Install Server', choose your server directory, and click "OK". 
3.) Go to your server directory, and create a mods directory. 
4.) Download your Arisux mod of choice, and AIRI. AIRI is required. 
5.) Copy the mods you just downloaded into the 'mods' directory. 
6.) Run the server不要做伸手党,。

关于下载地址
支持作者去原帖下载
http://www.planetminecraft.com/mod/alien-vs-predator-mod-1668966/download/mirror/109399/



END
